projects.title: Welcome to Beau's Portfolio!
projects.content:
While redesigning my portfolio, I struggled to imagine how to bridge content from so many different worlds onto a single website. As my career progresses, I don't want to stop sharing the content from my previous lives.

So I've created this retro platformer where you can explore my ideas and projects across my different lives and worlds.

  • Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to move
  • Press SPACE or UP ARROW to jump (double jump available!)

  • Enter doors to explore different themed worlds

projects.title: Movie Party
projects.content:
ðŸŽ¬ Movie Party

A social platform that enables friends to watch movies together remotely with perfect synchronization.

ðŸš€ Core Features

  • Synchronized Video Playback - Watch together across all devices with millisecond precision
  • Real-time Chat - Share reactions and comments during the movie
  • Room Management - Easy room creation and invitation system
  • Multiple Video Sources - Support for YouTube, Netflix, and custom uploads
  • User Profiles - Track watch history and favorite genres
  • Cross-Platform - Works seamlessly on mobile and desktop

ðŸ’» Technical Architecture

Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance:

  • Frontend: React.js with WebSocket real-time communication
  • Backend: Node.js with Express and Socket.io
  • Database: MongoDB for user data and room management
  • Video Sync: Custom synchronization engine with sub-second accuracy
  • Deployment: Docker containers on AWS with auto-scaling

ðŸŽ¯ User Experience

The platform focuses on creating an authentic shared viewing experience:

"It feels just like being in the same room watching together!" - Beta User

Key UX Innovations:

  1. One-Click Join - No complicated setup, just share a link
  2. Smart Buffering - Automatically handles different internet speeds
  3. Reaction System - Express emotions with quick emoji reactions
  4. Watch Parties - Schedule future viewing sessions

ðŸ“Š Impact & Usage

  • 10,000+ active users during beta
  • 500+ simultaneous movie parties per day
  • 99.9% synchronization accuracy
  • 4.8/5 average user rating

The platform has successfully brought people together during remote times, creating lasting memories and connections through shared entertainment experiences.
